name: MamaVerse
description: MamaVerse is a Virtual Reality Land that rains BNB. It's the best Passive Income earning project on BSC with over 10different ways of Earning. Ecosystem comprises of Virtual Land, NFT Gallery and MARKETPLACE, Gaming, Crypto Education, Decentralized Exchange. Native token is CoinMama/C-Mama Uniqueness of the token are as follows: You will earn fractions of BNB from all transactions on the MamaVerse Network forever and also for holding CoinMama/C-Mama token. All earned BNBs are sent automatically to your Trust wallet or Metamask. C-MAMA Token gives you 100% access into the various digital platforms in the MamaVerse ecosystem. You can buy virtual lands, play games, purchase NFTs, access crypto educational modules, etc using the C-MAMA Token as a medium of exchange. You can add liquidity on Pancake Swap using C-MAMA Token and earn umlimited amount of fractions of BNB forever. Ever rising through Strategic marketing and Burning Mechanisms.
